title: Cyberpunk 2077 and Religion - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.25.19
description:
Go to http://Brooklinen.com and use promo code GAMES for 10% off AND free shipping.

Boost is only available at http://Experian.com/kfgames.

Davis from The Warp Zone and Greg dive into how Cyberpunk's handling religion, Pokemon Go, and Cock Robin's square ice cream.

Time Stamps - 
 00:02:59 - Housekeeping
Mario Maker Party Mode today!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Colton Yoder, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:04:25 - Religion in Cyberpunk 2077, Matt Kim @ IGN
00:13:15 - Dragalia Lost Becomes Nintendo’s second most successful mobile game, Alex Malafeev @ SenorTower
00:15:17 - GTA online Casino Update Blocked in Over 50 Countries, Alysia Judge @ IGN
00:21:50 - Team Rocket is Back in Pokemon Go, Kevin Knezevic @IGN
00:24:32 - Fire Emblem: Three Houese and Wolfenstein Reviews are in!
00:28:35 Best Friend Q. - Did Horizon Zero Dawn really dive deep into climate change? Did it make you think about climate change? What games made you really think about our real life issues? - The Nano Biologist
00:32:05 - Out today
00:43:10 -  EXPERIAN
00:40:43 -  BROOKLINEN
Reader mail   -
00:42:02 - With Microsoft removing Cortana from the xbox one dashboard is this a sign that AI assistants and gaming are just not going to get along?  - Borzen00
00:46:43 - Yesterday we discussed Friend Codes becoming less annoying. There's a hidden treasure with Friend Codes, privacy. - 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:49:21 - there's an editorial/opinion article on Climate Changes and it's resulting crisis needs to be highlighted in videogame. Here's the link
https://m.ca.ign.com/articles/2019/07/23/opinion-why-its-time-for-video-games-to-address-climate-change - BJ Bernardo
00:53:55 - Squad Up: Ryan Clark(Xbox One) - Hero of Time816
00:54:42 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host:Greg and Tim
GAMESCAST: Thursday, July 25th @ 2:30 p.m. - Tim, Greg, Andrea, and Davis
